Detailed Description

A class to fit pixels simultaneously from a set of vignets.

The model on a given vignet to be fitted is Model(i,j) = flux*PSF(i-xc,j-yc) + [Gal X Kernel](i,j) + sky where user chooses what to fit (flux, position, galaxy pixels and constant sky). The flux and sky are free to change on each vignets, but the galaxy pixels and the point source position are fixed at the best seeing resolution and photometric ratio vignet. PSF and Kernel should be given and will not be fitted.
